messages.subject: Melanie: Math Sites K-3
messages.msgSnippet: Melanie ( and any one else interested) : here s some sites-although i haven t checked them all out...many may cater to the school-at-home sector...so there s
messages.messageBody:
Melanie ( and any one else interested) :
here's some sites-although i haven't checked them all out...many may cater
to the school-at-home sector...so there's my disclaimer--nobody chew me out
for getting "school"ish info, please
:~)
Diana A.
"the world is our classroom"


----Original Message Follows----
Annenberg/CPB Projects Learner Online Math and science projects.
http://www.learner.org/info/news/9801msact.html

Aunty Math K-3 Math problems.
http://www.dcmrats.org/AuntyMath.html

Exploring Data. From Math Forum.
http://forum.swarthmore.edu/workshops/usi/dataproject/index.html

Harcourt Brace Math Grade 2 math page.
http://www.hbschool.com/glossary/math/glossary2.html

Gordon's Booklets All about math.
http://users.uniserve.ca/~g_games/booklets.html

INEW Workbook. Do math topics by subject/grade online or print out a
hardcopy.
http://www.accessone.com/inew/

Center for Innovation in Education, Inc Math Their Way, Math Their Way of
Thinking
website.
http://www.center.edu/

Math Lessons. Nicely organized.
http://www.col-ed.org/cur/math.html#math1

Math Resources Math Resources for parents included.
http://www.ed.gov/pubs/parents/Math/Resources.html

Mathematics and Children's Literature A bibliography.
http://homepages.together.net/~gorrilla/SLN/books.htm

Measure 4 Measure Tons of links to anything about measurement.
http://www.wolinskyweb.com/measure.htm

Mega Math Interactive on-line exhibits bring important math ideas to
elementary
students.
http://www.c3.lanl.gov/mega-math

100 Day Ideas. Includes picture of 100 dollar bill for 100th Day of School
activities.
http://www.fsu.edu/~finance/bank/money.html

Ron Wise's Geographical Directory of World Paper MoneyView pictures of money
by country.
http://aes.iupui.edu/rwise/notedir/mappage.html

SuperKids Math Worksheet Creator Create math worksheets.
http://www.superkids.com/aweb/tools/math/

Time Money Temperature Activities.
http://142.3.219.38/RR/database/RR.09.96/danylczuk2.html
